short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Knife Hit the target above and become the greatest knife master. Play right on Chromeâ„¢ Browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Knife Hit - Halloween Version, the thrilling knife-throwing game with a spooky twist, can now be played as a Chrome Extension in a convenient pop-up format that doesn't require an internet connection. Experience the excitement of Halloween Knife Hit directly from your Chrome browser, anytime and anywhere.

With the Halloween Knife Hit Chrome Extension, you can test your aim and precision with a variety of eerie targets without needing an internet connection. Aim carefully, throw knives, and hit your targets with accuracy to progress through challenging levels.

Whether you're a fan of arcade games or enjoy Halloween-themed experiences, the Chrome Extension version of Halloween Knife Hit offers a seamless and offline gaming adventure. Get ready to embrace the Halloween spirit and showcase your knife-throwing skills in this addictive game, now available in a pop-up format on your Chrome browser.
